titleStmt.title: A pleasant new song betwixt the saylor and his love. To the tune of Dulcina.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F.C. dwelling in the Old-Bayly.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "VVhat doth aile my love, so sadly ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
